markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expanded Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1172) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 8 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=265)

</column>

---

You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects. Select one domain from your deity’s alternate domains. You gain access to that domain and an initial domain spell for that domain.
name: Expanded Domain Initiate
